traits.name: Keen Sight and Smell
entries: The owlbear has advantage on Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) checks that rely on sight or smell.

actions.name: Multiattack
entries: The owlbear makes two attacks: one with its beak and one with its claws.

actions.name: Beak
entries: Melee atk +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. 10 (1d10 + 5 damage) piercing damage.

actions.name: Claws
entries: Melee atk +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 14 (2d8 + 5 damage) slashing damage.
